person.persName: Oliver Lucas (assistant editor, Louisville Daily Journal)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, newspaper editor. Kentucky native. Assistant Editor of the Louisville Journal in 1860 and 1861.
Born in Kentucky in 1829, Oliver Lucas was the clerk board alderman, as well as the assistant editor for the Louisville Daily Journal.
